document.full_text: a new taskforce focused on fraud in energy markets will look into whether consumers are being gouged at the gas pump or traders are manipulating the markets, u.s. attorney general eric holder said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. eyes price gouging, manipulation in energy market
lines_and_colors: a new taskforce focused on fraud in energy markets will look into whether consumers are being gouged at the gas pump or traders are manipulating the markets, u.s. attorney general eric holder said on tuesday.
